https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nMhKJVLiC7e81WYVQGyI8l6DpUt.jpg Lorenzo Caruso is a piscologist who lives in a provincial town with his daughter Giulia, the only company since the death of his wife. Suddenly Lorenzo's life is upset by the discovery that Giulia is part of a baby gang: she steals in supermarkets, she has already collected several complaints. Everything Lorenzo has always believed in: communication, understanding, freedom with your daughter is in crisis. Caruso, zero in condotta
